roleset.name: to spend, consume
roleset.note: EXPEND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'expend' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. No VN class. FN class Expend_resource. frames created by Olga. Updated 2/13 by Katie. (from expend.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Mr. Good , who [*T*-1] documents these things as best he can [*?*], provides an official explanation in the form of a memorandum from Chief of Staff George C. Marshall to President Roosevelt : `` [1,430 pounds of ammunition]-3 , '' he wrote his commander in chief [0] [*T*-2] , were expended [*-3] on `` unidentified aircraft , '' flying at speeds as slow as 200 mph and elevations between 9,000 and 18,000 feet .
example.arg: on `` unidentified aircraft , '' flying at speeds as slow as 200 mph and elevations between 9,000 and 18,000 feet

example.name: expenditure-n
example.text: What is the purpose of transportation-related expenditures?
